attributes.action: Ban Donald Trump from entering the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
His call for the “total and complete shutdown” of US borders to Muslims came today (07/12/2015) after the San Bernardino terrorist attack.

- http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-35035190
- http://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2015/dec/07/donald-trump-ban-all-muslims-entering-us-san-bernardino-shooting
- http://www.nytimes.com/politics/first-draft/2015/12/07/donald-trump-calls-for-banning-muslims-from-entering-u-s/?_r=0
attributes.background: Donald Trump, front-runner to become the Republican party’s nominee for US presidential candidate, has called for all Muslims to be banned from entering the US. This applies to both Muslim tourists and Muslims seeking visas. A person with intent to insight racial hatred should not be welcome here.
